parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To testify falsely, bear false witness. From pseudomartur; to be an untrue testifier, i.e. Offer falsehood in evidence.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
